name: Elon Musk
bio: Elon Musk is a South African-born Canadian-American businessman, inventor, and investor who has a net worth of $333 billion. Elon Musk is currently the richest person in the world. In November 2021, when his net worth briefly topped $340 billion, Elon surpassed John D. Rockefeller to become the richest person in modern history.

name: Jeff Bezos
bio: Jeff Bezos is an American philanthropist, businessman and space explorer who has a net worth of $226 billion. Jeff Bezos earned his fortune as the founder of Amazon.com. Jeff Bezos is the former CEO and current president and chairman of the board of Amazon. He was the richest person in the world without interruption between October 2017 and January 2021.

name: Larry Ellison
bio: Larry Ellison is an American billionaire entrepreneur who has a net worth of $204 billion. Larry Ellison earned his enormous fortune as the founder of software giant Oracle. He also served as CEO until September 2014. Ellison's net worth makes him one of the richest people in the world, behind other tycoons like Jeff Bezos.

name: Mark Zuckerberg
bio: Mark Zuckerberg is an American technology entrepreneur and philanthropist who has a net worth of $200 billion. The vast majority of Mark's fortune is attributable to his shares in Facebook.

name: Bernard Arnault
bio: Bernard Arnault is a French billionaire entrepreneur who has a net worth of $181 billion. Bernard Arnault earned his fortune as the chairman and chief executive of the world's largest luxury goods company, LVMH.

name: Bill Gates
bio: Bill Gates is an American billionaire entrepreneur, author and philanthropist who has a net worth of $156 billion. Bill Gates earned his first fortune as the co-founder and former chairman and CEO of Microsoft. The proceeds of his sales have funded Cascade Investment LLC.

name: Larry Page
bio: Larry Page is an American billionaire entrepreneur who has a net worth of $150 billion. Larry Page earned his fortune as the co-founder of Google, which is today known by its umbrella parent company Alphabet.

name: Steve Ballmer
bio: Steve Ballmer is an American businessman and sports team owner who has a net worth of $145 billion. The vast majority of Steve Ballmer's net worth is derived from his 333.3 million shares of Microsoft stock. That is roughly 4% of the total outstanding shares. Steve is actually the company's largest individual shareholder.

name: Sergey Brin
bio: Sergey Brin is a Russian-born American computer scientist and internet entrepreneur who has a net worth of $141 billion. Sergey Brin earned his net worth as the co-founder of Google, which today is known by umbrella parent company Alphabet. He co-founded the company with Larry Page, a classmate at Standford's computer science graduate program.

name: Warren Buffett
bio: Warren Buffett is an American investor and philanthropist who has a net worth of $138 billion. Warren's wealth comes from his ownership stake in the holding company Berkshire Hathaway. Warren Buffett is widely considered the greatest investor of the 20th century.

name: Jensen Huang
bio: Jensen Huang is a Taiwanese-American billionaire business magnate and electrical engineer who has a net worth of $120 billion. Jensen Huang earned his fortune as the co-founder and CEO of the technology company Nvidia Corporation, which designs GPUs, APIs, and SoCs, among other hardware and software.

name: Michael Dell
bio: Michael Dell is an American business executive and technology entrepreneur who has a net worth of $112 billion. Dell dropped out of college and abandoned his unfinished medical degree to start a computer repair business that would prove to be extremely profitable. This $1,000 venture eventually grew into Dell, Inc.

name: Mukesh Ambani
bio: Mukesh Ambani is an Indian businessman who has a net worth of $108 billion. Mukesh Ambani earned his net worth through his career at Reliance Industries, a Fortune 500 company, where he is chairman, managing director, and largest shareholder.

name: Françoise Bettencourt-Meyers
bio: Françoise Bettencourt-Meyers is a French author and heiress who has a net worth of $102 billion. Françoise Bettencourt-Meyers is the richest woman in the world. Françoise inherited her fortune from her mother, the late Liliane Bettencourt. Liliane was one of the principal shareholders of L'Oreal. To this day, Françoise's family still retains a 33% stake in L'Oreal. She mostly focuses on writing Bible commentaries and books on Jewish-Christian relations.

name: Carlos Slim Helu
bio: Carlos Slim Helu is a Mexican businessman who has a net worth of $101 billion. Carlos Slim Helu is the richest person in Mexico and one of the richest people in the world. He earned his fortune thanks to his roughly 57% stake in the mobile phone giant America Movil. He also holds large stakes in the banking and insurance company Grupo Financiero Inbursa and holding company Grupo Carso, and other stakes in companies including Minera Frisco and the New York Time

name: Gautam Adani
bio: Gautam Adani is an Indian entrepreneur who has a net worth of $101 billion. Gautam Adani is a billionaire industrialist and philanthropist from India, best known as the founder and chairman of the multinational conglomerate Adani Group.

name: Amancio Ortega Gaona
bio: Amancio Ortega Gaona is a Spanish fashion executive and entrepreneur who has a net worth of $85 billion. Amancio Ortega Gaona earned his fortune as the founder of Inditex, which is the parent company of fashion empire Zara.

name: Jim Walton
bio: Jim Walton is an American billionaire businessman who has a net worth of $75 billion. Jim Walton is the youngest son of Walmart founder Sam Walton. Upon Sam's death, Jim and his siblings split a roughly 40% stake in their father's company.

name: Rob Walton
bio: S. Robson Walton, better known as Rob Walton, is an American businessman who has a net worth of $74 billion. Rob Walton is the eldest son of the founder of Walmart, Sam Walton.

name: Alice Walton
bio: Alice Walton is the daughter of Walmart founder Sam Walton. Alice Walton has a net worth of $73 billion. Alice Walton is one the richest women in the world and the 20 richest people in the world.

name: Michael Bloomberg
bio: Michael Bloomberg is an American politician and entrepreneur who has a net worth of $70 billion. Michael Bloomberg earned his fortune through his financial news and information services media company Bloomberg LP.

name: Vladimir Putin
bio: Vladimir Putin is a Russian politician who was born in the Soviet Union and has a net worth of $70 billion dollars. Vladimir Putin is currently the Acting President of the Russian Federation.

name: Julia Flesher Koch
bio: Julia Flesher Koch is an American businesswoman and philanthropist who has a net worth of $63 billion. Julia Flesher Koch inherited her fortune as the widow of billionaire tycoon David Koch.

name: Charles Koch
bio: Charles Koch is an American businessman who has a net worth of $60 billion. For much of his adult life, Charles has been co-owner of Koch Industries, along with brother David.

name: Jacqueline Mars
bio: Jacqueline Mars is a billionaire heiress and philanthropist who has a net worth of $55 billion. Jacqueline Mars is the daughter of Forrest Edward Mars, Sr., and granddaughter of Frank C. Mars,

name: John Mars
bio: John Mars is a Wyoming-based businessman who has a net worth of $54 billion. John Mars serves as the chairman of the multinational Mars corporation. A member of the prominent Mars family, he is the grandson of Frank C. Mars, who started the eponymous confectionery and food company in Tacoma, Washington in 1911.

name: David Thomson
bio: David Thomson, the 3rd Baron Thomson of Fleet, is a Canadian businessman, media magnate, art collector who has a net worth of $50 billion. David Thomson is the Chairman of the Thomson Reuters corporation and his family is the richest in Canada.

name: Colin Huang
bio: Colin Huang is a Chinese businessman, philanthropist, and investor who has a net worth of $49 billion. Colin Huang is best known for being the founder and former CEO of Pinduoduo, China's largest e-commerce platform. Pinduoduo is owned by PDD Holdings, which also owns e-commerce giant Temu.

name: Zhong Shanshan
bio: Zhong Shanshan is a Chinese businessman and entrepreneur who has a net worth of $47 billion. Zhong Shanshan earned his fortune thanks to the Chinese bottled water company Nongfu Spring and the Beijing Wantai Biological Pharmacy.

name: Jeff Yass
bio: Jeff Yass is a billionaire businessman who has a net worth of $46 billion. Jeff Yass earned his fortune as the co-founder of the Philadelphia-based trading and technology firm Susquehanna International Group.

name: Gerard Wertheimer
bio: Gerard Wertheimer is a French businessman who has a net worth of $45 billion. He is best known for owning and operating The House of Chanel perfume company. Their grandfather Pierre co-founded the House of Chanel with Coco Chanel.

name: Alain Wertheimer
bio: Alain Wertheimer is a French businessman who has a net worth of $45 billion. Alain Wertheimer and his brother Gerard own the controlling interest in the House of Chanel. The brothers are also invested in Bell & Ross. Their grandfather Pierre co-founded the House of Chanel with Coco Chanel.

name: Zhang Yiming
bio: Zhang Yiming is a Chinese businessman and entrepreneur who has a net worth of $44 billion. Zhang Yiming is a billionaire Chinese Internet entrepreneur, best known for co-founding the company ByteDance and developing its popular video-sharing service TikTok.

name: Phil Knight
bio: Phil Knight is an American businessman, sports fan and philanthropist who has a net worth of $43 billion. Phil Knight earned his net worth as the founder and largest individual shareholder of Nike Inc.

name: Stephen Schwarzman
bio: Stephen Schwarzman is an American businessman who has a net worth of $42 billion. That net worth makes him one of the richest people in New York. Stephen earned his fortune thanks to The Blackstone Group which he co-founded.

name: Changpeng Zhao
bio: Changpeng Zhao is a Chinese-Canadian business executive who has a net worth of $42 billion Also known in the crypto world simply as "CZ," Zhao is best known for founding the world's largest cryptocurrency exchange, Binance. Changpeng also serves as the CEO of this company.

name: Ken Griffin
bio: Ken Griffin is an American entrepreneur who has a net worth of $41 billion. Griffin is the CEO of Citadel, a hedge fund with over $65 billion in assets under management.

name: Giovanni Ferrero
bio: Giovanni Ferrero is an Italian businessman who has a net worth of $41 billion. Giovanni Ferrero was born in Farigliano, Italy in April 1964. He is best known for being part

name: Klaus-Michael Kuhne
bio: Klaus-Michael Kuhne has a net worth of $40 billion. In 2023 when his net worth surpassed the $30 billion net worth of German supermarket

name: Len Blavatnik
bio: Len Blavatnik is a Ukrainian-American businessman who has a net worth of $40 billion. Len Blavatnik earned his net worth through his business investments in coal, oil, real estate and more

name: Francois Pinault
bio: François Pinault is a French luxury goods mogul who has a net worth of $40 billion. His net worth has grown astronomically in recent years.

name: Ma Huateng
bio: Pony Ma Huateng is a Chinese internet entrepreneur who has a net worth of $38 billion. Ma Huateng, nicknamed "Pony," is the founder, president, chief executive officer, and executive board member of Tencent Holdings, Ltd.

name: MacKenzie Scott
bio: MacKenzie Scott, formerly known as MacKenzie Bezos, is an American novelist, philanthropist and activist who has a net worth of $36 billion. MacKenzie Scott

name: Shiv Nadar
bio: Shiv Nadar is an Indian tech tycoon who has a net worth of $35 billion. Shiv Nadar is the founder and chairman of HCL

name: Vladimir Potanin
bio: Vladimir Potanin is a Russian billionaire oligarch who has a net worth of $35 billion. That makes Vladimir one of the richest people in Russia.

name: Tadashi Yanai
bio: Tadashi Yanai is a Japanese entrepreneur who has a net worth of $35 billion. A businessman and CEO, Tadashi Yanai is the President and founder of the Japanese company, Fast Retailing

name: Jack Ma
bio: Jack Ma is a Chinese businessman and investor who has a net worth of $34 billion. He is best known as the co-founder and former executive chairman of the multinational conglomerate, Alibaba Group.

name: Miriam Adelson
bio: Miriam Adelson is an Israeli American physician, political donor and casino heiress who has a net worth of $34 billion.

name: Lee Shau Kee
bio: Lee Shau Kee is a real estate mogul from Hong Kong who has a net worth of $33 billion. Born in Shunde, Guangdong, China, in 1928, Lee Shau Kee is the majority owner of Henderson Land Development, a Hong Kong-based company that works in property development, management, and construction.

name: Eric Schmidt
bio: Eric Schmidt is an American businessman and philanthropist who has a net worth of $32 billion. Eric Schmidt is most notable for being the former CEO of Google. Eric was brought in to take over as CEO from company founders Larry Page and Sergey Brin in 2001.

name: Dan Gilbert
bio: Dan Gilbert is an American self-made entrepreneur who has a net worth of $32 billion dollars. Dan Gilbert earned his fortune as the founder and CEO of Quicken Loans (originally called Rock Financial). The company's name was changed after it was purchased by Intuit Inc., the company that also created QuickBooks and TurboTax.

name: Li Ka-shing
bio: Li Ka-shing is a Hong Kong-born businessman who has a net worth of $31 billion. As of this writing, Ka-shing is one of the 40 richest people on the planet.

name: Eduardo Saverin
bio: Eduardo Saverin is a Brazilian-born internet entrepreneur who has a net worth of $30 billion. Eduardo Saverin is famous for being one of the co-founders of Facebook.

name: Mark Mateschitz
bio: Mark Mateschitz is an Austrian billionaire who has a net worth of $30 billion. Mark Mateschitz earned his fortune as a part-owner of the energy drink company Red Bull, which his father Dietrich Mateschitz co-founded in 1984.

name: Maha Vajiralongkorn
bio: Maha Vajiralongkorn is the crown prince of Thailand and has a net worth of $30 billion.

name: Dieter Schwarz
bio: Dieter Schwarz is a German entrepreneur who has a net worth of $30 billion. Dieter Schwarz inherited the Schwarz-Gruppe (Schwarz Group) from his father.

name: German Larrea Mota Velasco
bio: German Larrea Mota Velasco is a Mexican businessman who has a net worth of $30 billion. German Larrea Mota Velasco is the CEO of Grupo Mexico, the country's largest mining corporation and one of the largest copper producers in the world. What's more, he owns over 5,000 kilometers of railroads that stretch across 71% of Mexico.

name: Sultan of Brunei
bio: The Sultan of Brunei, also known as Hassanai Bolkiah Mu'izzaddin Waddaulah, has a net worth of $30 billion.

name: Sheikh Mansour bin Zayed Al Nahyan
img: Sheikh Mansour bin Zayed Al Nahyan.png
bio: Sheikh Mansour bin Zayed Al Nahyan is a United Arab Emirates politician and businessman who has a net worth of 30 Billion.

name: Aliko Dangote
bio: Aliko Dangote is a Nigerian businessman who has a net worth of $28 billion. Aliko Dangote has at times been the richest person in Nigeria

name: Abigail Johnson
bio: Abigail Johnson is an American businesswoman who has a net worth of $28 billion. Abigail Johnson is the Chairman, CEO and President of the company started by her father, Fidelity Investments.

name: He Xiangjian
bio: He Xiangjian is the co-founder of Midea Group who has a net worth of $27 billion. He Xiangjian owns Midea, which is one of

name: Savitri Jindal
bio: Savitri Jindal is an Indian steel baroness who has a net worth of $27 billion. Her fortune makes her the richest woman in India

name: R. Budi Hartono
bio: R. Budi Hartono is a Chinese Indonesian tobacco billionaire who has a net worth of $26 billion. Born in Indonesia, R. Budi Hartono and his brother

name: Andrew Forrest
bio: Andrew Forrest is a Western Australian mining magnate who has a net worth of $26 billion. Andrew Forrest is currently the non-executive chairman

name: Stefan Quandt
bio: Stefan Quandt is a German automobile heir who has a net worth of $26 billion. That makes him one of the richest people in Germany. He is also one of the richest people in the world.

name: Lukas Walton
bio: Lukas Walton is an American businessman who has a net worth of $26 billion. Lukas is best known for being an heir of Wal-Mart.

name: William Ding
bio: William Ding is a Chinese entrepreneur who has a net worth is $26 billion. In the late 90s, he founded the internet company, NetEase. NetEase's site, 163.com, has become the 27th most visited site in the world, largely due to its multiplayer gaming applications.

name: Susanne Klatten
bio: Susanne Klatten is a German businesswoman who has a net worth of $26 billion dollars. Susanne Klatten is the daughter of the late Nazi industrialist Herbert Quandt. With major holdings in BMW and the chemical company Altana, she is the richest woman in Germany and one of the richest people on the planet.

name: Eric Yuan
bio: Eric Yuan is a Chinese American businessman and entrepreneur who has a net worth of $25 billion. Eric earned his fortune as the founder and CEO of Zoom Video Communications.

name: Dustin Moskovitz
bio: Dustin Moskovitz is an American internet entrepreneur who has a net worth of $25 billion. Dustin Moskovitz earned his net worth as a co-founder of Facebook.

name: Elaine Marshall
bio: Elaine Tettemer Marshall is an American billionaire who has a net worth of $24 billion. Elaine Marshall is a member of the Board of Koch Industries and is the widow of E. Pierce Marshall, from whom she inherited her position and wealth.

name: Takemitsu Takizaki
bio: Takemitsu Takizaki is a Japanese billionaire who has a net worth of $24 billion. Takemitsu Takizaki is the founder of Keyence, a company which creates sensors, bar-code readers, vision systems, digital microscopes and other electronic components for factory automation systems. Even though labeled as manufacturer, Keyence specializes solely in product planning and development and does not manufacture final products.

name: Iris Fontbona
bio: Iris Fontbona is a Chilean businesswoman who has a net worth of $24 billion. Iris Fontbona earned her fortune by marrying Andronico Luksic, who built one of the biggest copper mining companies in the world, Antofagasta.

name: Forrest Mars Jr
bio: Forrest Mars, Jr. is the eldest son of Forrest Mars Sr. and grandson of Frank C. Mars, founders of the American candy Mars.

name: Gina Rinehart
bio: Gina Rinehart is an Australian mining heiress who has a net worth of $23 billion. Gina Rinehart is the richest person in Australia and one of the richest people in the world. Gina currently serves as the Executive Chairwoman of Hancock Prospecting, a company she inherited from her father.

name: Wang Wei
bio: Wang Wei is a Chinese transportation and logistics entrepreneur who has a net worth of $22 billion. Wang Wei prefers to keep a low profile running his unlisted company, SF Express, behind closed doors. His SF Express provides super-fast delivery throughout most of China's parts. It is now expanding into southeast region.

name: Qin Yinglin
bio: Qin Yinglin is a Chinese businessman and pig farmer who has a net worth of $22 billion. He made his money by being China's largest pig breeder. The country is the world's biggest pork consumer.

name: James Dyson
bio: Sir James Dyson is a British inventor, designer, farmer and entrepreneur who has a net worth of $22 billion. He is best known for founding the technology company Dyson

name: Satoshi Nakamoto
bio: Satoshi Nakamoto is a computer software developer and alleged Bitcoin entrepreneur who has a net worth of $22 billion. Satoshi Nakamoto is the pseudonym used by the person or persons who created the cryptocurrency bitcoin.

name: David Tepper
bio: David Tepper is an American businessman and philanthropist who has net worth of $21 billion. David Tepper earned his fortune as the founder of the hedge fund Appaloosa Management. For many years he was one of the richest people in New Jersey.

name: Xu Yangtian
bio: Xu Yangtian, better known as Chris Xu, is a Chinese fashion entrepreneur who has a net worth of $20 billion. Xu Yangtian earned his fortune as the founder of the e-commerce fast-fashion retail giant Shein.

name: Leonid Mikhelson
bio: Leonid Mikhelson is a Russian businessman who has a net worth of $20 billion dollars which makes him one of the richest people in Russia. He renamed the company, Novatek, and shepherded it through a massive restructuring that included adding oil and gas production to its pipeline and roadwork divisions.

name: Andy Bechtolsheim
bio: Andy Bechtolsheim is a German billionaire tech entrepreneur, electrical engineer and investor who has a net worth $20 billion. Andy earned his first fortune as the founder of Sun Microsystems  but the majority of his fortune comes thanks to Google. Andy and his former Stanford professor David Cheriton were the two FIRST investors in Google.

name: Salman bin Abdulaziz Al Saud
bio: Salman bin Abdulaziz Al Saud is the current King of Saudi Arabia. As of this writing he has a net worth of $20 billion.

name: Jorge Paulo Lemann
bio: Jorge Paulo Lemann is a Brazilian billionaire investment banker and businessman who has a net worth of $20 billion. Jorge Paulo Lemann first built his fortune in the 1970s as a co-founder of Banco Garantia.

name: John Menard
bio: John Menard, Jr. Net Worth: John R. Menard, Jr. is an American entrepreneur and billionaire who a net worth of $20 billion. He is the founder and owner of Menards, a major Midwestern home improvement chain. He is also a former IndyCar racing team owner. Menard is a partner in Robby Gordon Motorsports with NASCAR owner and driver Robby Gordon.

name: Fayez Sarofim
bio: Fayez Sarofim was an Egyptian-American billionaire and investment manager and businessman who had a net worth of $20 billion at the time of his death in 2022.

name: Alexey Mordashov
bio: Alexey Mordashov is a businessman who has a net worth of $20 billion dollars which makes him one of the richest people in Russia. He became general director in the mid-90s, and subsequently launched, Severstal, a mining conglomerate.

name: Dilip Shanghvi
bio: Dilip Shanghvi is an Indian pharmaceutical entrepreneur who has a net worth of $20 billion. Dilip Shanghvi is the founder and managing director of Sun Pharmaceutical Industries Limited. Ever since its creation in 1982, Sun Pharma has developed into the fifth-largest drug-maker in India.

name: Vladimir Lisin
bio: Vladimir Lisin is a Russian steel tycoon who has a net worth of $19 billion dollars. Lisin is the chairman and majority shareholder in one of the largest steel companies in Russia, Novolipetsk (NLMK).

name: Rupert Murdoch
bio: Rupert Murdoch is an Australian media mogul who earned his fortune as the founder of News Corp. Rupert Murdoch has a net worth of $19 billion.

name: Pallonji Mistry
bio: Pallonji Mistry is an Irish Indian billionaire who has a net worth of $19 billion dollars. He is the chairman of the Shapoorji Pallonji Group, a massive construction company that is responsible for most of the major buildings in Mumbai, including the Hong Kong & Shanghai Bank and the Standard Chartered Bank.

name: James Ratcliffe
bio: James Ratcliffe is a British chemical engineer turned financier and industrialist who has a net worth of $19 billion. Former engineer, James Ratcliffe has been chairing Ineos Group, chemical powerhouse with an estimated turnover of $44 billion, since 1998. Now he only serves as CEO of the company that has grown through acquisitions and partnerships.

name: Sheikh Khalifa Bin Zayed Al Nahyan
img: Sheikh Khalifa Bin Zayed Al Nahyan.png
bio: Khalifa bin Zayed bin Sultan Al Nahyan was the president of the United Arab Emirates, the supreme commander of the United Arab Emirates Armed Forces, and the Emir of Abu Dhabi. At the time of his death, Sheikh Khalifa Bin Zayed Al Nahyan had a net worth of $18 billion dollars.

name: Donald Bren
bio: Donald Bren is an American businessman who has a net worth of $18 billion. Donald Bren is the chairman of the Irvine Group and is widely regarded as the wealthiest real estate developer in the United States

name: David & Simon Reuben
bio: David & Simon Reuben are British businessmen and philanthropists who have a net worth of $18 billion. David and Simon first joined together in their Trans World group, which turned into the third largest metal producer in the world after they bought up more than half of Russia's aluminium industry.

name: Lakshmi Mittal
bio: Lakshmi Mittal is an Indian steel magnate who has a net worth of $18 billion. Based in the U.K., Lakshmi Mittal is the chairman and former CEO of the second-largest largest steel making company in the world, ArcelorMittal, and he serves as chairman of Aperam, a stainless steel manufacturer.

name: Alisher Usmanov
bio: Alisher Usmanov is an Uzbek-born Russian businessman who has a net worth of $18 billion. Alisher Usmanov has earned his net worth from mining, lumber, and various other investments. He is the majority shareholder of the Russian industrial conglomerate Metalloinvest, which he founded to manage Gazprom's metals interests.

name: Viktor Vekselberg
bio: Viktor Vekselberg is a businessman who has a net worth of $17 billion dollars which makes him one of the richest people in Russia. He began building up his fortune with copper and aluminum smelting businesses, and then moved to oil production. He became co-owner and chairman of Tyumen Oil in the mid-90s, and then brokered a deal with multinational oil company, BP.
